short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds accessibility and usability improvements to אייוועלט.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that provides useful keyboard shortcuts and accessibility features for the www.ivelt.com website, including the ability to go to the next page and previous page in a forum (אשכול) by pressing the right and left arrow keys.
